summary.body: Does anyone know if there are plans anywhere showing where the cables for the underfoor heating are?  I only ask because I am being woken uo at some god forsaken hour with boiling hot feet and then I can't get back to sleep.  No I don't sleep on the floor but hot air rises.  My bread is also hot as the heat must go up the table the bread box is on.  I could move bed setee and table if I could find a cool spot.
summary.subject: Baked feet

summary.body: Does anyone know where this website has gone?  Quite recently I used it to access flat plans, but it seems to have disappeared into cyberspace. Geoffrey
summary.subject: www.barbicanliving.co.uk

summary.body: Does anyone have a good map of the Barbican I can email people I want to find my flat in Andrewes - ie, showing entrances from street to podium. I've googled it, but most links use multimap which isn't detailed enough.
summary.subject: Good pedestrian map of Barbican
